page.title: 18LAW AND ORDER IN CRUDEN BAY.
page.content: There is a Police Station in Cruden Bay with one Constable stationed in the house adjoining it.When the local constable,is not available police will come from Boddam or Peterhead.The village is patrolled by a police car and occasionally on foot , by the local constable. There is little or no vandalism in Cruden Bay,but youngsters on motor bikes sometimes disturb the peace by riding around late at night. When something like the 'Gala' is on extra police and also special constables are brought in. When there is a 'disco' in the Village Hall,the police keep an eye on the proceedings.
